name: Veggies and Fruit Splash Mania-Classic Puzzle for Boys and Girls!
name_original: Veggies and Fruit Splash Mania-Classic Puzzle for Boys and Girls!
description:
Children can practice to learn alphabets from A to Z with Beautiful flash cards and Play Quiz.
This App Has awesome Features.Baby Can Learn

*A-Z Letters with 3 real time examples
**Match Alphabets in 3 different Levels
***Guess alphabet and Fruit Name in Quiz section

This is an ancient way to teach kids how to start learning alphabets and is known to be most effective and proficient way.
